title: ennaik-kaiviDuvAyO
sahitya:
ennaik-kaiiDuvAyO viTTAlum unnaDi viDamATTEn


anupallavi

  minnuDal vAzhvinilE ennenna nErndAlum unnarut-sheyalenrE innalai sahittiDum


caraNam    duSTa manakkurangai ettip-piDittizhuttE tuLLal aDakkinALum maLLa maLLap-pazhakki
naTTa tiruvaDiyil kaTTI ozhittu viTTu namah shivAya Om enrE nambi irukkum anban
